Author: catunicornmermaid
Text: I mean a boy also literally *cancelled* me (bought a plane ticket to see him, then last minute he texted me, “On second thought, I think it’d be better if you found ur own place, we can still hook up tho!!”) anddd I prob have strep throat and I LITERALLY gained FIVE POUNDS.  Someone from work just texted me, ”hey are you ok??” And NO. NO IM ISNT.
